#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <stdbool.h>

// Function for twos_in_factorial
int twos_in_factorial(int n) {
    int count = 0;
    int temp = n;
    while (temp) {
        count += temp & 1;
        temp >>= 1;
    }
    return n - count;
}

// Function parity_of_nCr
int parity_of_nCr(int n, int i) {
    int f_n = twos_in_factorial(n);
    int f_ni = twos_in_factorial(n - i);
    int f_i = twos_in_factorial(i);
    return (f_n - f_ni - f_i) > 0;
}

// Function for the second part's aaa
int aaa(int current, int N) {
    if (current > N) return 0;
    int valid = 1;
    int temp = current;
    if (temp == 0) valid = 0; // since 0 is not allowed unless part of a larger number?
    while (temp > 0) {
        int digit = temp % 10;
        if (digit !=3 && digit !=5 && digit !=7) {
            valid =0;
            break;
        }
        temp /=10;
    }

    }
    return ans;
}
